Referral Program

Your referral link

Do NOT register another account using your own referral link. This will lead to a loss of both accounts with all the funds, according to the User agreement. If you need a second account, contact support via tickets and explain, why do you need one. Usually we do allow multiple accounts in case you have reasonable grounds.
